Reviews.Title: “Noise Kept Us Up at Night”
Reviews.Author: kjchicago
Reviews.Content: This hotel has no soundproofing, so the noise from the street (mainly people fighting in the alley next to the hotel) kept us up at night and construction woke us up way too early. We had to leave early. There are better values available in Barcelona.

Reviews.Title: “Very noisy at night”
Reviews.Author: gizmo38
Reviews.Content: Although this hotel is conveniently located near the centre, it is in one of the seediest streets we found in Barcelona, and was extremely noisy all night long. Our rooms on the 4th floor (402 & 403) gave out onto an alleyway where junkies gathered every night and made an unbelievable amount of noise. Windows were not double-glazed, so it was hard to get a good night's sleep. The heating was not easy to adjust (mostly too hot), but opening the window was not really an option. We were surprised that the hotel did not serve breakfast. On the good side, the rooms were clean and reasonably sized for a city centre hotel and the bathroom was large. The hotel is just a few minutes walk from La Rambla and the Liceu metro station.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, great value, clean, friendly”
Reviews.Author: gaddingabout
Reviews.Content: Just got back from a four night stay in Hotel Alba. It is a fantastic location putting you just off La Rambla mid way between Plaza Catalunya and the Port area. The nearest Metro is Liceu on the green line and very handy. The best part is that the hotel alba is right near a fabulous food market where you can pick up delicious fresh food and juices for breakfast or lunch or eat right there if you like. This makes up for not having tea/coffee facilities in the room which i usually must have. I paid €350 euros for the four nights and it ran into a bank holiday weekend at that. The staff were all very nice and friendly. It was very easy to access the free fast wireless internet with your laptop in the room. Yes, there are hookers about but i challenge anyone to find a hooker free spot in barcelona. Barcelona itself is elegant and electric place - i will go again as soon as i get a chance and will stay at the hotel alba again.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel in the center of Barcelona, very clean rooms”
Reviews.Author: Germany2
Reviews.Content: Very good location, city center, next to Ramblas, clean, nice-looking rooms. The staff is friendly and attentive. It´s truly a pleasant stay in Barcelona.

Reviews.Title: “Barcelona”
Reviews.Author: Photolynx
Reviews.Content: The Alba was recommended by some friends. I stayed there for four nights, the staff were very helpfull, and patient as my Spanish is not too good at present, ( but will improve by my next visit.) and I would stay at the Alba again. It is a really nice clean place, in a central location, short walk to the main bus station , and La Ramblas is just at the top of the street, if you fell out out of bed you would land in La Boqueria, (social meeting place and fruit, meat, fish market ...well give or take a bounce or two from a nice cafe, or Restaurant. ) Picture this, you arrive in Barcelona, get the airport bus to Catulunya, (main stop), drop bags off at the Alba, and hit La Ramblas, within 5 mins walk, look out for the Princess, and her husband a fellow street entertainer the drunken Pirate, great people.............best meals where found off the Ramblas.........( no offence intended to La Ramblas Traders ).....be it ......Le Born or El Ravel ....the food is good, as a general rule of the thumb, be entertained at La Ramblas , eat at Born or Ravel, and do please excuse my bad English, and yes I am English.

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: elborn
Reviews.Content: Stayed for 4 nights and it was good value. Staff were friendly and helpful, room very clean with a good bathroom. Location, just off the Ramblas, behind the boqueria was perfect. Area is lively, great bar/restaurant just across the street, tucked away in a courtyard. Cafe con leche and croissant just 1.5 Euros at the bar on the corner - beat that on the Ramblas!

Reviews.Title: “Lovely Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Anna93
Reviews.Content: We stayed for 3 nights in this hotel, and we were very pleased with the standard overall. In fact, we were quite pleasantly surprised after reading the previous reviews! It was extremely clean, and in a superb location (just off La Ramblas and near the metro). We found the hotel to be great value for money and the staff were pleasant - the manager knocked on our door on our final evening and gave us a box of chocolates! We definitely recommend people to come here, and believe you will enjoy it just as much as we have.

Reviews.Title: “awful do not stay here!”
Reviews.Author: omIreland
Reviews.Content: Yuk, its dirty, hard to find, small, no air conditioning in room, in red light area, prostitutes under your balcony, pick pockets and junkies everywhere, and it wasn't that cheap!!!!!i could only manage one night , the next night we chose to stay in a private apartment
